omfg come on
15 torrents of the same show
put them all in the same torrent
youll get a bigger torrent swarm

The Reason these torrents are broken up are that there are over 60 gigs of files all together. 

By uploading them as single files, I can Seed these and start new seeds much quicker. Otherwise, It would take a few weeks to download a 60 gig file. But I am glad that you are at least downloading and hopefully contributing.
